title: Metaphor_pics in Semantics and Pragmatics [Non-Fiction] PDF_(K-S
description:
English | ISBN: 1107606667, 1107022541 | 2013 | PDF | 240 pages | 4,5 MB

'Metaphor', a form of figurative language in which one thing or idea is expressed in terms of another, is becoming an increasingly popular area of study, as it is relevant to the work of semanticists, pragmatists, discourse analysts and also those working at the interface of language and literature and in other disciplines such as philosophy and psychology.
